content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STLoadChild_CY3Month') )
    DROP VIEW dbo.T_STLoadChild_CY3Month
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[T_STLoadChild_CY3Month]

AS 

WITH CTE AS (

SELECT lms_track_loadid as lms_loadchild_id 
FROM dbo.T_STLMSTrack_CY3Month 


UNION

SELECT lms_loadchild_id
FROM dbo.T_STLoadChild 
WHERE lms_loadchild_ldate >= DATEADD(m,-3, DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE()),0))
AND lms_loadchild_ldate <= DATEADD(nanosecond,-50,DATEADD(d,1,CAST(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS DATETIME2(7))))

)

SELECT 
LC.*
FROM CTE 
LEFT JOIN dbo.T_STLoadChild LC on LC.lms_loadchild_id  = CTE.lms_loadchild_id
